author: DontForgetTheDivy
body:
You can sign up here for free: [https://www.cnbc.com/investingclub/](https://www.cnbc.com/investingclub/)  He will email alerts of every move he's going to make with the trust before he does it.

Current holdings are: ABT, ABBV, AMD, GOOGL, AMZN, AEO, AAPL, BA, AVGO, CVX, CSCO, COST, DIS, DD, LLY, EL, F, HON, LIN, MRVL, MA, FB, MSFT, MS, NLOK, NUE, NVDA, PYPL, CRM, UNP, UPS, WMT, WFC, WYNN

I'm not a super fan or anything, but I listen to anyone for ideas and make my own decisions.
